products.name: Info : My ING AU
products.description:
The app displays list of products provided by ING Bank (Australia). All details are fetched from public `Products` data provided by the bank.

Search `Open Banking` or CDS by Gov. of Australia.

Enjoy the Product details on your wrist (fitbit) !

products.name: Fixed Rate Loan
products.description: Fixed interest rate home loans for terms of one to five years.

products.name: Savings Maximiser
products.description: High variable interest rate. And no fees or penalties on withdrawals.

products.name: Savings Accelerator
products.description: A tiered savings account, with a high variable interest rate.

products.name: Personal Term Deposits
products.description: A high interest rate guaranteed for the term. You choose the timeframe.

products.name: Business Optimiser
products.description: A high variable interest business savings account with 24/7 access.

products.name: Business Term Deposit
products.description: A high fixed interest rate for business savings. You choose the time frame.

products.name: Mortgage Simplifier
products.description: Low variable interest rate home loan with no ongoing monthly or annual fees.

products.name: Orange Advantage
products.description: Includes a 100% interest offset when linked to our Orange Everyday bank account.
